# NSApplication.RequestUserAttentionType

**Enumeration**

These constants specify the level of severity of a user attention request and are used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/cancelUserAttentionRequest(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/requestUserAttention(_:)].

## Declaration

```swift
enum RequestUserAttentionType
```

## Constants

- **NSApplication.RequestUserAttentionType.criticalRequest**: The user attention request is a critical request.
- **NSApplication.RequestUserAttentionType.informationalRequest**: The user attention request is an informational request.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing user attention requests

- **requestUserAttention(_:)**: Starts a user attention request.
- **cancelUserAttentionRequest(_:)**: Cancels a previous user attention request.
- **reply(toOpenOrPrint:)**: Handles errors that might occur when the user attempts to open or print files.
- **NSApplication.DelegateReply**: Constants that indicate whether a copy or print operation was successful, was canceled, or failed.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
